articles.title: Saudi Arabia soccer spending ranks second in the world as it bids to become global powerhouse - CNBC
articles.description: Saudi clubs outspent four of the "big five" soccer leagues, the first time another league has outspent any members of the dominant European grouping since 2016.
articles.content:
The Saudi Arabian soccer transfer window has slammed shut, marking the end of a historic summer of spending from clubs based in the Gulf state.

articles.title: Germany ends Team USA's FIBA World Cup run in semifinals - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: Germany knocked off Team USA 113-111 on Friday to advance to Sunday's FIBA Basketball World Cup championship game against fellow European powerhouse Serbia.

articles.title: European gas prices jump 10% as strikes get underway at major LNG facilities in Australia - CNBC
articles.description: European gas prices moved sharply higher on Friday as workers at Australian natural gas facilities went on strike.
